name: Carolee Rigsbee (she/her)
bio: Carolee Rigsbee, PhD, has extensive project management and QA leadership experience gained through her work in the nuclear R&D, aerospace & defense, telecom, food manufacturing, advisory services, and higher education industries.  Specializing in strategic management as an academic, her research is focused on the design of organization governance and value chain structures and processes that strengthen stakeholder voice and reduce obstacles to the achievement of societal goals.
